channel.title: [ Delta ] How Do I change Start Off area From Edge? [ Delta ]
channel.description: ohk so right now in my source I start off in edge near the coffins down south where the big broken brick thingy magig is with the pillars and stuff soz for the very confusing writing its that im in a hurry to upadte my server Thanks in advance Willing To Rep+++

item.title: [ Delta ] How Do I change Start Off area From Edge? [ Delta ]
item.dc:creator: @_Troll-Scape ✆™☯Troll-Scape☯™✆
item.description:
@_Troll-Scape wrote:

[quote=“orcashark, post:11, topic:377834”][quote author=Ddragonimp link=topic=473719.msg3464396#msg3464396 date=1294785053]

No offense, but you must be a terrible coder. It takes knowelage next to nothing to code delta. It took me 4 days to learn everything i need to know to code a perfect delta. If you want pm me and ill teach you the basics.

Yet you dont have Enchanting on your server …

And i downloaded a PI server for about 4 minutes so i could create my daily guide PI is really easy to code in…

PI, Czar, Really easy dont understand how any one has issues coding
only issues i have now-a-days is with the client.

I dont understand how people have issues.
[/quote]

Lol. Why would i want shitty ass WoW features in my server. The reason why nobody else has it is because WoW sucks ass. If i really wanted to i could code enchanting on my server in less then 30 mins.[/quote]
You Wish JellyFish When Your more like DDragonimp and can code like him then go learn to be better and have nicer manners, ooops wait dickheads dont have manners

item.title: [ Delta ] How Do I change Start Off area From Edge? [ Delta ]
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

[quote=“✆™☯Troll-Scape☯™✆, post:5, topic:377834”][quote author=Ddragonimp link=topic=473719.msg3463888#msg3463888 date=1294749570]
kk sec ill post

clickingMost.java

case 73100:
case 4140:
case 50235:
c.triggerTele(3074, 3504, 0);//First int is X secont int is Y<------------------
c.killMyNPCs();
c.resetfollowers();
break;

client.java for when you die…

		if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 100 && IsInFightCave()) {
		        toX = 2439;//Here <-----------------------------
		        toY = 5169;
			AtkPray = 0;
			StrPrayer = 0;
			DefPray = 0;
			RangePray = 0;
			MagePray = 0;
			PrayHeal = false;
			ProtItem = false;
			ProtMage = false;
			ProtRange = false;
			ProtMelee = false;
			Redemption = false;
			Retribution = false;
			Smite = false;
			Chivalry = false;
			Piety = false;
			isSkulled = false;
			lastSkull = 0;
			headIcon = 0;
			turnpray();
			heightLevel = 0;
			currentHealth = maxHealth2;
			deathStage = 0;
			resetAnimation();
			frame1();C
			prayOn = false;

[/quote]
Dude Your Such A beast Coder teach me to be like you oh wise one XD[/quote]

No offense, but you must be a terrible coder. It takes knowelage next to nothing to code delta. It took me 4 days to learn everything i need to know to code a perfect delta. If you want pm me and ill teach you the basics.

item.title: [ Delta ] How Do I change Start Off area From Edge? [ Delta ]
item.dc:creator: @_Troll-Scape ✆™☯Troll-Scape☯™✆
item.description:
@_Troll-Scape wrote:

[quote=“Ddragonimp, post:2, topic:377834”]player.java

	int month = cal.get(Calendar.MONTH);
	int year = cal.get(Calendar.YEAR);
	int calc = ((year * 10000) + (month * 100) + day);
	playerLastLogin = calc;
	playerLastConnect = "";
	playerIsMember = 1;
	playerMessages = 0;

	// Setting player standard look
	playerLook[0] = 2;
	playerLook[1] = 6;
	playerLook[2] = 7;
	playerLook[3] = 10;
	playerLook[4] = 5;
	playerLook[5] = 0;

	// initial x and y coordinates of the player
	heightLevel = 0;
	// the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper
	// initialization packet
	toX = 2999;
	toY = 3383;

This code here
^
|
|
|[/quote]
you my friend are now a legend (well in my mind at least along side cole1497 krackkid reyx7 frell and tthe other cool guys)
edit: oh and while your online how do i change my home teleport in the mage book? thanks in advance! rep++ btw

item.title: [ Delta ] How Do I change Start Off area From Edge? [ Delta ]
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

player.java

	int month = cal.get(Calendar.MONTH);
	int year = cal.get(Calendar.YEAR);
	int calc = ((year * 10000) + (month * 100) + day);
	playerLastLogin = calc;
	playerLastConnect = "";
	playerIsMember = 1;
	playerMessages = 0;

	// Setting player standard look
	playerLook[0] = 2;
	playerLook[1] = 6;
	playerLook[2] = 7;
	playerLook[3] = 10;
	playerLook[4] = 5;
	playerLook[5] = 0;

	// initial x and y coordinates of the player
	heightLevel = 0;
	// the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper
	// initialization packet
	toX = 2999;
	toY = 3383;

This code here
^
|
|
|
